unnormalised: IIT Kanpur just unveiled their latest creation – a robotic chaiwallah! Seriously, they’ve named it “ChaiBot 5000”. I'm not kidding. The press release says it can brew 200 cups/hr of masala chai. Imagine, never having to argue with your local tapri guy again over the price!
